name: Swords of Edo A Visual Novel
blurb: Swords of Edo is a fully featured visual novel, with bishoujo artwork and a core ecchi battle system for PC, Mac & Linux.

rewards.reward: Happy Day Credit ============================= As a great thank you for pledging, your name will be included in the games credits menu item. All higher reward levels also include this reward.

Swords of Edo Wallpapers ============================= At this reward level you will receive the complete set of Swords of Edo wallpapers, with artwork from the graphic novels and game. All reward levels above also include this reward including the standalone reward items.

Single Platform Game ============================= This mini reward will give you a digital download of version 2.0 of the game when it is completed on a single launch platform of your choice. You can choose either Pc, Mac or Linux at the campaigns conclusion.

Stand-alone digital art ============================= This reward level is an upgrade to the digital wallpapers reward level. And was requested by existing backers for those who already have the game. At this level you will receive the digital wallpapers reward as well as a variety of bonus content such as high resolution images showing the evolution of some characters from sketch to final version and additional wallpapers from the new artwork we will be creating in the version 2.0 expansion funded via this campaign.

Just a Tshirt ============================= This stand alone reward will allow you to get just the T-shirt, you can pick any of the designs we release during the campaign and a size from small to XX-Large.

The Visual Novel ============================= This reward will give you the version 2.0 of the visual novel game when it is complete with all final artwork and storyline as a digital download on all launch platforms.
Just the Poster ============================= This stand alone reward will allow you to receive a poster, you can pick any of the designs we release during the campaign.

Mobile Case ============================= This stand alone reward will allow you to receive a mobile phone case (read the main content for current mobile cases available), you can pick any of the designs we release during the campaign.
Digital Anthology Graphic Novel ============================= This stand alone reward  will give you a digital copy of the 250+ page Swords of Edo anthology book. (final version due: April 2014)

Standard Ecchi Poster Standalone  ============================= This brand new reward level is for our recently announced Ecchi Poster. (preview images and details are available on update #24). Pledging at this level will get you the standard sized poster (43.9x28.6cm). In addition you can choose to add an extra \u00a35 to the reward level to upgrade to glossy poster stock. Shipping costs already included.

Beta Novel ============================= At this level in addition to receiving the version 2.0 edition of the game as a digital download, you will also be able to join the currently underway beta development of version 1.0 as we finalise the remaining storyline, fix bugs and complete the final pieces of artwork for inclusion in the game. This will essentially give you instant access to the games development at the campaigns end.

Just the Game ============================= This reward level will give you a physical copy of the version 2.0 edition of the game when it is complete as a standalone DVD, the DVD also comes with a variety of bonus items including a set of postcards and DVD insert for the game.

Large Ecchi Poster Standalone  ============================= This brand new reward level is for our recently announced Ecchi Poster. (preview images and details are available on update #24). Pledging at this level will get you the larger sized poster (59.4x41.9cm). In addition you can choose to add an extra \u00a35 to the reward level to upgrade to glossy poster stock. Shipping costs already included.

Game & Beta ============================= This reward level will not only give you the physical DVD copy of version 2.0 of the game, but it will also give you the digitally downloadable version and instant access to the Beta version 1.0 currently underway at the campaigns conclusion.

Hardcover Anthology Graphic Novel ============================= This stand alone reward  will give you a physical hard cover with dust jackets edition of the 250+ page Swords of Edo anthology book. (final version due: April 2014) In addition you will also receive a digital copy of the anthology book.

Book, Game & Beta ============================= This epic reward level will give you a physical copy of version 2.0 of the visual novel game, when it is complete, a physical hardcover edition of the Swords of Edo Anthology book and instant access to version 1.0 Beta of the Visual Novel Game at the campaigns conclusion. In addition you will receive digital downloads of the anthology book and the game on all launch platforms. Worldwide shipping included.

Final Rei Figurines ============================= At this special reward level you can get hold of one of our very last Rei figurines. An 8 inch figurine currently in production. In addition to which you will also receive a physical copy of version 2.0 of the game, beta access and the digital downloadable versions of the game on all release platforms. Worldwide shipping is included in the pledge level. This could be one of the last opportunities to receive this figurine.
